Title: One Last Shot
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Sam Ernst, Tonya Kong (story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jay Ali
Plot: Fisk's long-awaited reunion doesn't go as planned. Nelson & Murdock take on a new client who holds key information on Kingpin.
